    tag = 'V'¶
    property x¶

    Removes rows of corresponding to primary forces

    class ema.utilities.matrices.DiagFlex_matrix(model, Roption=None)¶

    Bases: ema.utilities.matrices.Structural_Matrix

    FS_MATRIX block diagonal matrix of element flexibity matrices for structural model FS = FS_MATRIX (MODEL,ELEMDATA,ROPTION) the function sets up the block diagonal matrix of element flexibility matrices FS for the structural model specified in data structure MODEL with element property information in cell array ELEMDATA; if ROPTION=0, element release information is not accounted for in setting up Fs (default=1)
